segment.source: How to use the Automatic Version Synchronization page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to download the IE11 Setup file each time you run the Wizard.
segment.target: How to use the Automatic Version Synchronization page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to download the IE11 Setup file each time you run the Wizard.

segment.source: Use the Automatic Version Synchronization page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Automatic Version Synchronization page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Automatic Version Synchronization page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Automatic Version Synchronization page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Automatic Version Synchronization page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 runs the synchronization process every time you run the wizard, downloading the Internet Explorer 11 Setup file to your computer.
segment.target: The Automatic Version Synchronization page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 runs the synchronization process every time you run the wizard, downloading the Internet Explorer 11 Setup file to your computer.

segment.source: The Setup file includes the required full and express packages.
segment.target: The Setup file includes the required full and express packages.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: You must run the Automatic Version Synchronization page once for each operating system and language combination of IE.
segment.target: You must run the Automatic Version Synchronization page once for each operating system and language combination of IE.

segment.source: The Automatic Version Synchronization page tells you:
segment.target: The Automatic Version Synchronization page tells you:

segment.source: Version available on your machine.
segment.target: Version available on your machine.

segment.source: The version of IE11 that’s running on the computer that’s also running the IE Customization Wizard 11.
segment.target: The version of IE11 that’s running on the computer that’s also running the IE Customization Wizard 11.

segment.source: Latest version available on web.
segment.target: Latest version available on web.

segment.source: The most recently released version of the IE Customization Wizard 11.
segment.target: The most recently released version of the IE Customization Wizard 11.

segment.source: To get this value, the wizard compares the version of IE on your computer to the latest version of IE on the Downloads site.
segment.target: To get this value, the wizard compares the version of IE on your computer to the latest version of IE on the Downloads site.

segment.source: If the versions are different, you’ll be asked to update your version of IE.
segment.target: If the versions are different, you’ll be asked to update your version of IE.

segment.source: Disk space required.
segment.target: Disk space required.

segment.source: The amount of space on your hard drive needed to update the browser.
segment.target: The amount of space on your hard drive needed to update the browser.

segment.source: Disk space available.
segment.target: Disk space available.

segment.source: The amount of hard drive space available on the computer that’s running the IE Customization Wizard 11.
segment.target: The amount of hard drive space available on the computer that’s running the IE Customization Wizard 11.

segment.source: To use the Automatic Version Synchronization page
segment.target: To use the Automatic Version Synchronization page

segment.source: Click Synchronize.
segment.target: Click Synchronize.

segment.source: You might receive a security warning before downloading your Setup file, asking if you want to continue.
segment.target: You might receive a security warning before downloading your Setup file, asking if you want to continue.

segment.source: Click Run to continue.
segment.target: Click Run to continue.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Custom Components page or Back to go to the Feature Selection page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Custom Components page or Back to go to the Feature Selection page.
